## function_createRating
> **createRating**(`props`?): [`RatingWidget`](#ratingwidget)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:277

Create a RatingWidget with given config props

### Parameters

#### props?

[`PropsConfig`](../types#propsconfig)\<[`RatingProps`](#ratingprops)\>

### Returns

[`RatingWidget`](#ratingwidget)

a RatingWidget

## function_getRatingDefaultConfig
> **getRatingDefaultConfig**(): [`RatingProps`](#ratingprops)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:10

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Rating config

### Returns

[`RatingProps`](#ratingprops)

the default Rating config

## interface_RatingApi
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:317

Interface representing the API that can be performed on a rating component.

### Methods

#### leave

> **leave**(): `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:338

Leave the rating, resetting the visible rating to the rating value and triggering the onLeave callback

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### setHoveredRating

> **setHoveredRating**(`index`): `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:332

Sets the hovered rating value.

##### Parameters

###### index

`number`

Star index, starting from 1

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### setRating

> **setRating**(`index`): `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:324

Sets the rating value.

##### Parameters

###### index

`number`

Star index, starting from 1

##### Returns

`void`

## interface_RatingDirectives
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:299

Interface representing directives for a rating component.

### Properties

#### containerDirective

> **containerDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:305

A directive to be applied to the main container
This will handle the keydown, mouseleave, tabindex and aria attributes

***

#### starDirective

> **starDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)\<\{ `index`: `number`; \}\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:311

A directive to be applied on each star element

## interface_RatingProps
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:125

Represents the properties for the Rating component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:234

The aria label

##### Default Value

`'Rating'`

***

#### ariaLabelledBy

> **ariaLabelledBy**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:242

The aria labelled by

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### ariaValueTextFn

> **ariaValueTextFn**: (`rating`, `maxRating`) => `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:137

Return the value for the 'aria-valuetext' attribute.

##### Parameters

###### rating

`number`

Current rating value.

###### maxRating

`number`

maxRating value.

##### Returns

`string`

##### Default Value

```ts
(rating: number, maxRating: number) => `${rating} out of ${maxRating}`
```

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:249

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### disabled

> **disabled**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:199

If `true`, the rating is disabled.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### maxRating

> **maxRating**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:191

The maximum rating that can be given.

##### Default Value

`10`

***

#### onHover

> **onHover**: (`rating`) => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:163

An event emitted when the user is hovering over a given rating.

Event payload is equal to the rating being hovered over.

##### Parameters

###### rating

`number`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onLeave

> **onLeave**: (`rating`) => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:176

An event emitted when the user stops hovering over a given rating.

Event payload is equal to the rating of the last item being hovered over.

##### Parameters

###### rating

`number`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onRatingChange

> **onRatingChange**: (`rating`) => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:150

An event emitted when the rating is changed.

Event payload is equal to the newly selected rating.

##### Parameters

###### rating

`number`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### rating

> **rating**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:183

The current rating. Could be a decimal value like `3.75`.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### readonly

> **readonly**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:207

If `true`, the rating can't be changed.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### resettable

> **resettable**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:217

Define if the rating can be reset.

If set to true, the user can 'unset' the rating value by cliking on the current rating value.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### star

> **star**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`StarContext`](#starcontext)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:259

The template to override the way each star is displayed.

##### Default Value

```ts
({fill}: StarContext) => String.fromCharCode(fill === 100 ? 9733 : 9734)
```

***

#### tabindex

> **tabindex**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:226

Allows setting a custom rating tabindex.
If the component is disabled, `tabindex` will still be set to `-1`.

##### Default Value

`0`

## interface_RatingState
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:16

Represents the state of a rating component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:94

The aria label

##### Default Value

`'Rating'`

***

#### ariaLabelledBy

> **ariaLabelledBy**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:102

The aria labelled by

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### ariaValueText

> **ariaValueText**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:21

the aria value of the rating

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:109

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### disabled

> **disabled**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:59

If `true`, the rating is disabled.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### interactive

> **interactive**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:31

is the rating interactive i.e. listening to hover, click and keyboard events

***

#### maxRating

> **maxRating**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:51

The maximum rating that can be given.

##### Default Value

`10`

***

#### rating

> **rating**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:43

The current rating. Could be a decimal value like `3.75`.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### readonly

> **readonly**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:67

If `true`, the rating can't be changed.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### resettable

> **resettable**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:77

Define if the rating can be reset.

If set to true, the user can 'unset' the rating value by cliking on the current rating value.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### star

> **star**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`StarContext`](#starcontext)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:119

The template to override the way each star is displayed.

##### Default Value

```ts
({fill}: StarContext) => String.fromCharCode(fill === 100 ? 9733 : 9734)
```

***

#### stars

> **stars**: [`StarContext`](#starcontext)[]

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:36

the list of stars

***

#### tabindex

> **tabindex**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:86

Allows setting a custom rating tabindex.
If the component is disabled, `tabindex` will still be set to `-1`.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### visibleRating

> **visibleRating**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:26

the visible value of the rating (it changes when hovering over the rating even though the real value did not change)

## type alias_RatingWidget
> **RatingWidget**: [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`RatingProps`](#ratingprops), [`RatingState`](#ratingstate), [`RatingApi`](#ratingapi), [`RatingDirectives`](#ratingdirectives)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:267

Represents a Rating Widget component.

## interface_StarContext
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:285

Represents the context for a star in a rating component.

### Properties

#### fill

> **fill**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:289

indicates how much the current star is filled, from 0 to 100

***

#### index

> **index**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/rating/rating.gen.ts:293

the position of the star in the rating
